title: Stuck at "logging on" for few minutes then connection failure
body: open lol,  launch client, when I try to log in, it went "logging on" for few minutes then connection failure, I've ipconfig/ flush dns and restar and still not work. anyway how ? I use the old client.

replies.body:
Sometimes your internet can be in perfect shape but it can still have problems talking with our servers for one reason or another. Since you've already tried configuring your IP and DNS flushing, try going over the rest of the steps in our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). 

Let me know if that helps more!
